  3. Clazziquai Project

DJ Clazzi

Horan

Alex Chu

Introduction

Clazziquai Project is a Korean group that originally started as an experimental project of DJ Clazzi (a.k.a Gim Seong Hun) in 2001. Also known as CLAZZIQUAI PROJECT, Clazziquai or CLAZZIQUAI, and CZQ. His music, similar to Shibuya-Kei's, is a fusion of different genres, but above all covers electronic, house, acid jazz, and groove.

in hiatus
